quote: I wrote your name in the sky, but the wind blew it away. I wrote your name in the sand, but the waves washed it away. I wrote your name in my heart, and forever will it stay.
author: Author

quote: You say you love rain, but you open your umbrella. You say you love the sun, but you find a shadow spot. You say you love the wind, but you close your windows. This is why I am afraid, you say that you love me too.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Life can give us lots of beautiful persons, But only one person is enough for a beautiful life..
author: Love

quote: An Eye with Dust n A Heart with Trust Always Cries!!!!!
author: Love

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself.
author: Josh Billings

quote: The TRUTH hurts only once but a LIE hurts every time you remember it!
author: Love

quote: In true love, there is no mountain too high to climb. No river too wide to cross. And most of all in true love there is no ends.
author: Author

quote: When we have each other we have everything.
author: Author

quote: All love is sweet, Given or returned. Common as light is love, And its familiar voice wearies not ever. They who inspire is most are fortunate, As I am now: but those who feel it most Are happier still.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: A person who irritates you always is the one who loves you but fails to express that.
author: Love

quote: The love we give away is the only love we keep.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Only from the heart Can you touch the sky.
author: Rumi

quote: When a man finds a good woman and treats her the way she deserves to be treated it will change his Life. God favors a man that finds his wife and Loves her the way God Loves her
author: Tony Gaskins

quote: True love doesn't happen right away; it's an ever-growing process. It develops after you've gone through many ups and downs, when you've suffered together, cried together, laughed together.
author: Ricardo Montalban

quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
author: Orson Welles

quote: The difference between like, love and in love is the same difference between for now, for a while and forever.
author: Love

quote: But love is blind, and lovers cannot see What petty follies they themselves commit
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Love is the same for a poor man, and a king.
author: Love

quote: Time passes memories fade, feeling change, people leave, but hearts never, but heart never forget.
author: Author

quote: Love feels no burden, thinks nothing of trouble, attempts what is above its strength, pleads no excuse of impossibility; for it thinks all things lawful for itself, and all things possible.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: If you love someone, you say it, right then, out loud. Otherwise, the moment just passes you by.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: A weed is no more than a flower in disguise, Which is seen through at once, if love give a man eyes.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet.
author: Plato

quote: Justice that love gives is a surrender, justice that law gives is a punishment.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Falling in love with you was never my intention. but it became my ADDICTION.
author: Love

quote: Trying to forget someone you love is like trying to remember someone you never knew.
author: Author

quote: True love never dies. It only gets stronger with time.
author: Author

quote: Love is a serious mental disease.
author: Plato

quote: I Know Im Not Perfect,But There Is No Defect In My Love
author: Love

quote: If you judge people you have no time to love them.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Do not keep the alabaster boxes of your love and tenderness sealed up until your friends are dead. Fill their lives with sweetness, speak cheering words while their ears can hear, and while their hearts can be thrilled and made happier by them. George
author: Williams Childs

quote: Love is like the sun coming out from the clouds and warming your soul.
author: Love

quote: Don't fall in love with someone you can live with, fall in love with someone you can't live without
author: Love

quote: Love begins in a moment, grows over time, and lasts for eternity.
author: Love

quote: Love is the most beautiful lie of all.
author: Love

quote: When I say I Love You,? Im not kidding I really do Love you and all I want is to be with you and no one else.
author: Love

quote: We live in the world when we love it.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Love in its essence is spiritual fire.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Pure love is a willingness to give without a thought of receiving anything in return.
author: Peace Pilgrim

quote: The hottest love has the coldest end.
author: Socrates

quote: Every love story is beautiful but ours is my favorite.
author: Love

quote: Never try to define love. Once defined love is confined. Once confined -- It dies.
author: Source Unknown

quote: Fortune and love favor the brave.
author: Ovid

quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Love is misunderstood to be an emotion; actually, it is a state of awareness, a way of being in the world, a way of seeing oneself and others.
author: David R. Hawkins

quote: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: I am a lover not a fighter, but I will fight for what i love.
author: Love

quote: A man without ambition is dead. A man with ambition but no love is dead. A man with ambition and love for his blessings here on earth is ever so alive.
author: Pearl Bailey

quote: We realise the value of life increases only after it is lost.
author: Love

quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Its hard to forget the past with someone you want a future with..
author: Love

quote: Destroy everything you love before everything you love destroys you.
author: Author

quote: Based on a psychological study, a crush only lasts for a maximum of 4 months. If it exceeds, you are in love.
author: Love

quote: Love is the slowest form ofÂ  suicide.
author: Author

quote: Love cannot live where there is no trust.
author: Edith Hamilton

quote: Chemistry can be a good and bad thing. Chemistry is good when you make love with it. Chemistry is bad when you make crack with it.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: Love is like the five loaves and two fishes, It doesnt start to multiply until you give it away.
author: Love

quote: I want our relationship to be like Tom and Jerry. No matter how many times we fight, we wont be apart.
author: Love

quote: One day a man asked God… What is the difference between your love and our love.. God smiled and said A bird in the sky is my love and a bird in a cage is your love…
author: Author

quote: The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: The good memories are kept in your mind the best are kept in your heart.
author: Love

quote: Love is photogenic. It needs darkness to develop.
author: Love

quote: In this world there is no perfect guy and there is no perfect girl. But only a less than perfect guy and a less than perfect girl can make a perfect love.
author: Love

quote: Not all men are fools, Some stay bachelor.
author: Love

quote: We are asleep until we fall in love.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Whatever is done for love always occurs beyond good and evil.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love is a policy, without terms and conditions.
author: Love

quote: The way is not in the sky. The way is in the heart.
author: Gautama Buddha

quote: If you love something, let it go. If it comes back, it was meant to be.If it does not, hunt it down & kill it.
author: Love

quote: Nationalism is inspired by the highest ideals of the human race, satyam [the truth], shivam [the God], sundaram [the beautiful].
author: Subhash Chandra Bose

quote: The things that will destroy America are prosperity-at-any-price, peace-at-any-price, safety-first instead of duty-first, the love of soft living, and the get-rich-quick theory of life.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Love is a trap. When it appears, we see only its light, not its shadows.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Tell that person you love them. Life is way too short to keep everything to yourself because one day youre going to wake up and wonder, what if..
author: Love

quote: When i first met you i never thought i would fall for you, After i fell for you i never thought i would love you, but i do and i dont want it to change.
author: Love

quote: Do you believe in love at first sight? Or do I have to walk past you again?
author: Love

quote: Like the measles, love is most dangerous when it comes late in life.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Scratch a lover, and find a foe.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: I hate losing and cricket being my first love, once I enter the ground it's a different zone altogether and that hunger for winning is always there.
author: Sachin Tendulkar

quote: I dont care how hard being together is, nothing is worse than being apart.
author: Love

quote: I love going out and doing new things.
author: Bo Jackson

quote: The desire for possession is insatiable, to such a point that it can survive even love itself. To love, therefore, is to sterilize the person one loves.
author: Albert Camus

quote:
You re special to me in every way. Thank you for being who you are.

Your LOVE and My EFFORT together will conquer the WORLD.
author: Love

quote: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Him that I love, I wish to be free — even from me.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: To fall in love is easy, even to remain in it is not difficult; our human loneliness is cause enough. But it is a hard quest worth making to find a comrade through whose steady presence one becomes steadily the person one desires to be.
author: Anna Louise Strong

quote: No one should teach who is not in love with teaching.
author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster

quote: Love yourself accept yourself forgive yourself and be good to yourself because without you the rest of us are without a source of many wonderful things.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: To an ordinary human being, love means nothing if it does not mean loving some people more than others.
author: George Orwell

quote: I do not love you as if you were salt-rose, or topaz,or the arrow of carnations the fire shoots off.I love you as certain dark things are to be loved,in secret, between the shadow and the soul.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: To a young heart everything is fun.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Behold, my friends, the spring is come; the earth has gladly received the embraces of the sun, and we shall soon see the results of their love!
author: Sitting Bull

quote: They do not love that do not show their love. The course of true love never did run smooth. Love is a familiar. Love is a devil. There is no evil angel but Love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: True love is night jasmine, a diamond in darkness, the heartbeat no cardiologist has ever heard. It is the most common of miracles, fashioned of fleecy clouds -- a handful of stars tossed into the night sky.
author: Jim Bishop

quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!
author: Anne Frank

quote: The flowering of love is meditation.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: We realise the value of life increases only after it is lost.
author: Love

quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: True love is night jasmine, a diamond in darkness, the heartbeat no cardiologist has ever heard. It is the most common of miracles, fashioned of fleecy clouds -- a handful of stars tossed into the night sky.
author: Jim Bishop

quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!
author: Anne Frank

quote: The flowering of love is meditation.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: We realise the value of life increases only after it is lost.
author: Love

quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Its hard to forget the past with someone you want a future with..
author: Love

quote: Destroy everything you love before everything you love destroys you.
author: Author

quote: Based on a psychological study, a crush only lasts for a maximum of 4 months. If it exceeds, you are in love.
author: Love

quote: Love is the slowest form ofÂ  suicide.
author: Author

quote: Love cannot live where there is no trust.
author: Edith Hamilton

quote: Chemistry can be a good and bad thing. Chemistry is good when you make love with it. Chemistry is bad when you make crack with it.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: Love is like the five loaves and two fishes, It doesnt start to multiply until you give it away.
author: Love

quote: I want our relationship to be like Tom and Jerry. No matter how many times we fight, we wont be apart.
author: Love

quote: One day a man asked God… What is the difference between your love and our love.. God smiled and said A bird in the sky is my love and a bird in a cage is your love…
author: Author

quote: The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: The good memories are kept in your mind the best are kept in your heart.
author: Love

quote: Love is photogenic. It needs darkness to develop.
author: Love

quote: In this world there is no perfect guy and there is no perfect girl. But only a less than perfect guy and a less than perfect girl can make a perfect love.
author: Love

quote: Not all men are fools, Some stay bachelor.
author: Love

quote: We are asleep until we fall in love.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Whatever is done for love always occurs beyond good and evil.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love is a policy, without terms and conditions.
author: Love

quote: The way is not in the sky. The way is in the heart.
author: Gautama Buddha

quote: If you love something, let it go. If it comes back, it was meant to be.If it does not, hunt it down & kill it.
author: Love

quote: Nationalism is inspired by the highest ideals of the human race, satyam [the truth], shivam [the God], sundaram [the beautiful].
author: Subhash Chandra Bose

quote: The things that will destroy America are prosperity-at-any-price, peace-at-any-price, safety-first instead of duty-first, the love of soft living, and the get-rich-quick theory of life.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Love is a trap. When it appears, we see only its light, not its shadows.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Tell that person you love them. Life is way too short to keep everything to yourself because one day youre going to wake up and wonder, what if..
author: Love

quote: When i first met you i never thought i would fall for you, After i fell for you i never thought i would love you, but i do and i dont want it to change.
author: Love

quote: Do you believe in love at first sight? Or do I have to walk past you again?
author: Love

quote: Like the measles, love is most dangerous when it comes late in life.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Scratch a lover, and find a foe.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: I hate losing and cricket being my first love, once I enter the ground it's a different zone altogether and that hunger for winning is always there.
author: Sachin Tendulkar

quote: I dont care how hard being together is, nothing is worse than being apart.
author: Love

quote: I love going out and doing new things.
author: Bo Jackson

quote: The desire for possession is insatiable, to such a point that it can survive even love itself. To love, therefore, is to sterilize the person one loves.
author: Albert Camus

quote:
You re special to me in every way. Thank you for being who you are.

Your LOVE and My EFFORT together will conquer the WORLD.
author: Love

quote: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Him that I love, I wish to be free — even from me.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: To fall in love is easy, even to remain in it is not difficult; our human loneliness is cause enough. But it is a hard quest worth making to find a comrade through whose steady presence one becomes steadily the person one desires to be.
author: Anna Louise Strong

quote: No one should teach who is not in love with teaching.
author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster

quote: Love yourself accept yourself forgive yourself and be good to yourself because without you the rest of us are without a source of many wonderful things.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: To an ordinary human being, love means nothing if it does not mean loving some people more than others.
author: George Orwell

quote: I do not love you as if you were salt-rose, or topaz,or the arrow of carnations the fire shoots off.I love you as certain dark things are to be loved,in secret, between the shadow and the soul.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: To a young heart everything is fun.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Behold, my friends, the spring is come; the earth has gladly received the embraces of the sun, and we shall soon see the results of their love!
author: Sitting Bull

quote: They do not love that do not show their love. The course of true love never did run smooth. Love is a familiar. Love is a devil. There is no evil angel but Love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: True love is night jasmine, a diamond in darkness, the heartbeat no cardiologist has ever heard. It is the most common of miracles, fashioned of fleecy clouds -- a handful of stars tossed into the night sky.
author: Jim Bishop

quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!
author: Anne Frank

quote: The flowering of love is meditation.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
